string-array.name: motivationalMessages
string-array.item: You\'re fat, and you shouldn\'t! Run for it!
You can throw in the towel, or you can use it to wipe the sweat off of your face.
Don\'t let fatigue make a coward of you.
If you train your mind for running, everything else will be easy.
You don\'t stop running because you get old, you get old because you stop running.
Runners just do it, they run for the finish line even if someone else has reached it first.
